column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Loved this place! Since I was solo
column2: I sat at the bar with no wait. It was a very chill atmosphere
column3: one tv at the bar. I was greeted by the bartender
column4: my bad for not cleaning my ears out
column6: although the music wasn't too loud. I pretty much knew I was going to order a personal pan deep dish
column7: went for the Lou Manati classic.
